data.name: RiboDoc
data.description: Docker based tool for ribosome profiling (RiboSeq) analysis

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "* A FASTA format annotation file corresponding to the reference genome. We advise you to download it from the [Ensembl](https://www.ensembl.org/index.html) database, as the files are maintained up to "
“RiboDoc is a bioinformatics pipeline for Ribosome sequencing (Ribo-seq) data made to perform quality control, trimming, alignment and downstream qualitative and quantitative analysis.”

“Thus, this pipeline is built using Snakemake, a workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data analyses. Additionally, it is a Docker-based package, which means it can be used by anyone.”
